title: Selle San Marco Limited Edition Concor 50 Eroica
content:
Perhaps Selle San Marcoâ€™s most iconic saddle is the Concor and for the 50th anniversary of this iconic saddle, the brand teamed up for a collaboration with Eroica on a limited edition release.

50 years ago, the Concor redefined how saddles were made and influenced the future of cycling. At the heart of this iconic design is the saddle profile that works with the natural shape of your body to support you on long rides. The narrow saddle and ergonomic approach are paired with a full leather upper and chromed steel rails. Available for a limited time only.

Weight: 300 g
Dimensions: L1 140 x 265 mm
Rail: Carbon Steel / silver

See more at Selle San Marco.

The post Selle San Marco Limited Edition Concor 50 Eroica appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
